text:
@realDonaldTrump @OANN Thank you for staying focused on COVID-19 during this awful pandemic.

And you gave yourself a 10...  

Nobody fails better than you.  Believe me.

Also, thanks for disbanding the WH Pandemic Response Team the year before.  A lot of blood is on your tiny little hands. #Dotard https://t.co/tqwzVebnHb
